title: Snake Classic
description: The classic Snake game where you grow by eating food while avoiding walls and yourself. Compete for the highest score!

controls.Arrow Keys: Move snake up, down, left, right

rules: Eat food to grow your snake and increase your score
Avoid hitting walls or your own tail
Each food item increases your score by 10 points
Game speed increases as you grow longer
Final score determines your rank and winnings

powerUps.name: Score Multiplier
powerUps.description: Double points for next 3 food items
